contact.name: Mauno Vihinen
contact.address: Institute of Medical Technology ,FI-33014 University of Tampere, Finland

acknowledgement.name: Tampere University Hospital Medical Research Fund

comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing
Clinically diagnosed as HIES, complex clinical manifestations

susceptibility to various types of microorganisms (virus, intracellular and extracellular bacteria and fungi), atopic dermatitis-like skin inflammation starting from 1 month of age, and a high amount of serum IgE (2100 IU/ml), recurrent otitis media, sinusitis, pneumonias, skin abscesses, oral candidiasis, molluscum contagiosum, and herpex simplex infection in skin and mucosa, BCG infection at 22 months and nontyphi salmonella gastroenteritis at 15 years of age.

consequence.term: A frame shift deletion mutation in the exon 2 leading to a premature stop codon in the FERM domain
